text: Lyuben Kostov () (born 8 March 1935) is a former Bulgarian footballer. He was the top scorer of the 1960 championship (with 12 goals for Spartak Varna). ==References== *Player profile at portalfootball.net Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgaria international footballers Category:PFC Cherno More Varna players Category:PFC Spartak Varna players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Association football forwards
title: Lyuben Kostov
